scripts.build: pnpm run build:js:tauri-commands:esm && pnpm run build:js:holochain-env && rollup -c && pnpm run import:holochain-service-types
scripts.build:js:tauri-commands:esm: tsc guest-js/tauri-commands/*.ts --outDir dist-js/tauri-commands/  --declaration --target es2021 --moduleResolution bundler --module esnext  --skipLibCheck true
scripts.build:js:holochain-env: tsc guest-js/holochain-env/*.ts --outDir dist-js-tmp/holochain-env/ --target es2021 --moduleResolution bundler --module esnext --skipLibCheck true
